description: [ServHelper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0382) has a module to delete itself from the infected machine.(Citation: Proofpoint TA505 Jan 2019)(Citation: Deep Instinct TA505 Apr 2019)

external_references.description: Schwarz, D. and Proofpoint Staff. (2019, January 9). ServHelper and FlawedGrace - New malware introduced by TA505. Retrieved May 28, 2019.
Vilkomir-Preisman, S. (2019, April 2). New ServHelper Variant Employs Excel 4.0 Macro to Drop Signed Payload. Retrieved September 16, 2024..
